desc: The US Marine Corps (USMC) is America's go-to expeditionary force, a military service designed to react quickly to crises around the world. Likewise, China has a similar force in the shape of the People's Liberation Army Navy Marine Corps.

title: Teen was speeding SUV for reels, lost my son due to him: Mother of dead Delhi man
desc: The mother of a 23-year-old man killed in a Delhi car crash on February 3 alleged that the minor was speeding his SUV while he was busy shooting reels, and that his reckless driving costed his son's life.

title: In English, please

title: Roberts accuses public servant of sexual assault
desc: Vanessa Turnbull-Roberts says she stepped down as the ACT's first Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander children and young people commissioner to prioritise her safety after being subjected to sexual harassment and sexual assault by a public servant.

title: Giving people cash didn’t cause more injuries or deaths
desc: As cash transfer programs expand across the United States, critics often warn that giving people money could spark reckless behavior, leading to injuries or even deaths. But a sweeping 11-year analysis of Alaska’s long-running Permanent Fund Dividend program tells a different story. Researchers examined statewide hospital records and death data and found no increase in traumatic injuries or unnatural deaths after annual payments were distributed.
